name: Twitterbotpy
tagline: Code for a blank Twitter Bot written in Python using Twython
body:
### What is this?
This is a simple automated twitter bot written in Python using the Twython Library.

### What does it do?
This twitter bot will automatically search for tweets from a given criteria, then retweet the tweet(s) from that search. It will also favourite/like the tweet(s) and follow the account it was tweeted from.
It also will follow all of your followers.

It does this once every 20 minutes(can be configured). 

### Authors and Contributors
Me! - @awoodcroft95
